info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:09PM CDT until April 09 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR WESTERN CALDWELL AND NORTHEASTERN GUADALUPE COUNTIES... At 1109 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Martindale, or near San Marcos, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Kyle, Lockhart, Martindale, Uhland, Mustang Ridge, Niederwald, Staples, Fentress, Maxwell, Reedville, Mendoza and Redwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
